description.en: Cats, deer, and centipedes attack Tama-san, who by chance says goodbye to the manga cafe he spent several years in in Tokyo and sets up a residence in the mountains of Izu! Weekly Bunshun's popular serialization, Tamakichi Sakura's "Hibi wa Ningen" is finally in one volume! It's been three years since the start of the Weekly Bunshun serialization, which caused a sensation of "why?", and the long-awaited book release!! Delivering 150 times for 3 years. The first half of the turbulent three years is Tokyo Mankitsu edition, and the second half is Izu edition. Even though life has changed completely from a cozy private room annoyed by the noise of the neighbors to a mountain villa annoyed by the invasion of wildlife (hasn't it changed?), Tamakisetsu is still alive and well!
description.ja: ひょんなことから数年を過ごした東京の漫画喫茶に別れを告げ、伊豆の山中に居を構えた玉さんを襲う、ネコ・シカ・ムカデ！週刊文春好評連載、桜玉吉『日々我人間』がついに一冊に！「いったいなぜ？」と反響を呼んだ週刊文春連載開始からはや3年、待望の単行本化!!「すぐに休載するんでは？」などの憶測もなんのその、ほぼ隔週連載から毎号掲載になっても見事皆勤賞。その3年分150回をどーんとお届け。激動の3年間の前半は東京・漫喫編、後半は伊豆編。隣人の音に悩まされる満喫の狭い個室から、野生生物の襲来に悩まされる山荘へと生活はガラリと変わっても（変わってない？）、玉吉節は健在！

biography.en:
**Native name**: 桜玉吉 

**Alt. names**:
Charlie Nozawa
Nozawa Akira
Nozawa Charlie
チャーリー野沢
野澤朗
